column5: Wanted to give a shout out to Big Cliff on his scent elimentaor product again. Awesome product.  My trophy whitetail is in this summers Ontario Monster Whitetail magazine sent out today. Cool thing about it is that I stilll havnt seen my mount but James at Advanced put it together early for a photo shoot and now graces the magazine with a full page photo. As always insanely great work by James at Advanced and a big surprise to see my trophy before I get it!    Darrn
Hopefully get the full page picture in a day or two and Ill post it then.  d
